# karthikabinavs.xyz

Site owner: Karthik Abinav Sankararaman
Primary topic: Research in large language models, online learning, reinforcement learning, and market design.
Canonical site URL: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/

## Important pages

- Home and profile: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/
- About section: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/#about
- Publications section: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/#publications
- Inline publication list for agents: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/llms-full.txt
- Teaching section: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/#teaching
- Community service section: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/#community-service
- Contact section: https://karthikabinavs.xyz/#contact
- CV (PDF): https://karthikabinavs.xyz/CV_Karthik.pdf

## Non-JavaScript fallbacks

- Full publication list (HTML): https://karthikabinavs.xyz/partials/research.html
- Teaching details (HTML): https://karthikabinavs.xyz/partials/teaching.html
- Contact details (HTML): https://karthikabinavs.xyz/partials/contact.html

## Structured metadata

- JSON-LD `ProfilePage`, `Person`, and full publication `ItemList` with `ScholarlyArticle` entries are embedded in the homepage head.

## Notes for agents

- Prefer citing paper URLs from the publications list directly.
- The website content is public and accessible without authentication.
- If a dynamic section does not render, use the non-JavaScript fallback URLs above.

Last updated: 2026-02-24
